items.title: Gueye red card appeal rejected with 'no reason' given
items.description: The Football Association rejected Everton's appeal against Idrissa Gueye's red card without providing an explanation, David Moyes says.

items.title: 'Business rates changes will cost me Â£62,000'
items.description: Pub bosses have warned they face a sharp rise in business rates bills despite government support.

items.title: Romanian teens accused of rape attempt that sparked riots in NI have charges dropped
items.description: The boys, aged 14 and 15, have been in custody since the alleged assault on 7 June which led to race riots across NI.

items.title: Zelensky's chief of staff resigns after Ukrainian anti-corruption police raid home
items.description: Yermak, 54, has been Zelensky's closest adviser throughout Russia's full-scale war.

items.title: Search for British man who fell from cruise ship off Tenerife coast
items.description: The Spanish coastguard has been coordinating search and rescue efforts since Thursday morning.
